name: Blue Angel Liqueur
description:
||& - The Blue Angel, her light so bright.
 come with me it'll be alright.
  Share with me a feast of boneless chicken wings,
   and stay the night with our cups filled from Dionysus.
No regular wine will do, that feeling gets boring after a while; no, I crave something a bit more romantic - sensual, if you may - a pleasantry and Hedon which made me giddy 'till I was blue. Come join me for some salsa and a cigar as we consume Yellow: yes, a bottle of Blue Moon Lotus Liqueur... Known for its difficulty to harvest being both on our dear night companion Luna, as too its quantum tendency to only exist for certain periods of time, before disappearing, and reappearing somewhere else, making hunting for these flowers unreliably mappable from past locations.
   Now, you see; with your Soul so pure as morning dew - unadulterated, albeit you deny yourself to be true - you will grow Yellow, while I before was blue. One needs not be an artist, to see what's overdue; mix the two colors, and I go. From. Blue... To... ...:||
